title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message:
Hi,


This board had liquid damage in U6990. First PPBUS was 1V and going down, and also all main rails were bad. So finally i checked that R6905, U6990 and U7600 were bad and i replaced them. Now i get green light on magsafe, ppbus and other rails are stable but it doesnt starts. Trying SMC bypass i get fans spinning but no chime no boot. 


In SMC BYPASS all_sys is 0,03V.

ALso Checked u7000 17/18 and 27/28 are ok.


Any idea what else can be checked?

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message:
Board stays on, but no activity starting in SMC bypass mode?
Then you have a SMC sensor issue.

Check first AVREF_SMC voltage.
Next check SMC_DCIN/BATT_ISENSE and SMC_PBUS_VSENSE.

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message:
AVREF_SMC  is ok (3.3V)

SMC_DCIN/BATT_ISENSE  - nothing (0.05V)


SMC_PBUS_VSENSE - 0 V 


Already changed SMC from donor board and same result.

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message:
After SMC replacement when toggle SMC_ONOFF_L machine goes to S0 state ( no fan, no chime no image) and SMC_PBUS_VSENSE now 2.1 in S0 mode. 


GPU is getting a little warm. CPU cold

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message:
Any pulse on basic signals, in normal mode?
Trigger SMC_ONOFF_L and check power on sequence.

"Board stays on, but no activity starting in SMC bypass mode?"
???

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message: Solved. When was working U7600 area i put fuse instead of ressistance R7601 :D

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message: Still having problems. Battery is shorting board. It starts without battery and works fine, sometimes even it starts with battery too but usually when i start without battery then connect it fan stops. I already changed  ISL and SMC again. PPBUS is 12.60V

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message:
Never connect the battery with board already powered from charger!
You can fry the SMC one day...

Check again resistance between pins 17/18 and 27/28 at U7000.
Also monitor CHGR_A/BMON and SMC_DCIN/BATT_ISENSE levels.

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message:
17/18 - 3.3
27/28 - 21


All buttom measerments are done with magsafe and battery connected: 


CHGR_A/BMON - 0

SMC_DCIN - 0.6 (is it ok?)

BATT_ISENSE - 0V


"Never connect the battery with board already powered from charger!"

Thanks for that, i tried it many times but never thought that it may cause SMC damage. Something new learnt today:D

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message:
"SMC_DCIN - 0.6"
What is that???
Please post correct signal names...

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message: Smc_dcin_isense - 0.6v

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message:
"Also monitor CHGR_A/BMON and SMC_DCIN/BATT_ISENSE levels" 

I understand to check voltages on this rails, or  you mean resistance?

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message:
"voltages on this rails, or you mean resistance?"
Volyage level, of course.

"CHGR_A/BMON - 0"
Cannot be just 0V, if board turns on.
Maybe less than 0.5V, but need exact values.

Did you try known good battery?

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message:
CHRG_AMON - 0.752V
CHRG_BMON - 0.05V


Yes, battery is extracted from working macbook ( i dont even trust new ones i have)

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message: Board turns on with both charger and battery connected, in SMC bypass mode?

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message: No, Testing it now has been working from battery and charger, restarting, All ok, but it takes 5 minutes to fail again. Not starting in smc bypass when battery and charger are connected.

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message: I have board now connected magsafe and battery and it starts randomly without doing anything with board. Then when i unplug charger it stops (not  working frome battery).

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message: and now it is working from battery for 1 minute and stop. This board will make me go crazy.

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message:
Disconnect BIL connector when test with battery.
Also try another (original) battery.

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message:
It is disconnected when making tests. About battery i tried with ori battery and same. 


Another thing is happening. When i left computer charging some time (20-30 minites) after that it starts normally with battery and charger connected . After i disconnect and it still working as long as i have battery connected. BUt it never starts from only battery, magsafe must be plugged.

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message: Check the signals from power on sequence on battery only.

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message:
Could you detail more
what you mean please, i don?t understand that part, sorry.

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message:
The basic signals wich you check for a non-power issue.
3V42/PPBUS_G3H, SMC_RESET_L, RTC_RST_L, SM_INTRUDER_L, 0V9_S5...

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message:
PPBUS - 12.3 ( bad smc? i changed it twice, from donor)
PP3V42_G3H - 3.42 V
SMC_RESET_L - 3.4 V

RTC_RST_L - 3.4V
SM_INTRUDER_L - 3.4V

PP0V9_S5 this one is 0V.

So if pbus from battery on 12.3 is ok then the fail must be 0V9_S5 so i went to U7750 and see that PP3V3_S5 is not generated from battery.


Is it U7200 not recieving P3V3S5_EN from U7840 because this one doesnt get SMC_PM_G2_EN. So my fail is SMC?

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message:
Sorry, S5 state not achived on battery only, so no 0V9_S5 available.

12.3V on battery alone?
Did you try known good battery?

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message: Yes, i have 2 batteries extracted from macbooks with less than 10 cycles. Just put them back to check if they work and yes one is half charged it gives (11.6V) and other have 95% and gives 12,3 V on ppbus

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message:
also i can start in smc bypass from battery ( with no magsafe) but CPU not turning hot, so seems it is just entering s0 state without booting. i think even after changed twice the SMC it is failing
or smc or something near.


What u think?


P.S. connected display and from battery i can make fan spin in smc by pass but no image not bootng.

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message: If board starts with battery and charger in SMC bypass, check all voltage and current sensors in normal mode (pages 39/40).

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message:
I checked already all parts componentes, replaced SMC again and now, it works with battery and magasfe connected. But it doesnt boot if only battery, just spin hdd i can hear, for few seconds than stop.


Whe running from battery it shut down ( sometimes after 2 seconds other may delay untill 1 minute and shut down.

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message: Both batteries work properly with other board?

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message: Yes. Its very very strange problem. Today after cleaning a little board check ( visual) it booted from battery, without magsafe, after few boots it stopped working and return to previous issue

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message:
Give me any idea someone please . I need to find out what the hell is wrong with this mac. 



SMC bypass with battery is booting too.

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message:
Does it charge the battery?
Do you get amber light when both charger and battery connected?

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message: yes, it charge untill 100% and pass from amber to green.

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message:
Test the machine disconnecting internal keyboard.
Use R5014/15 pads to turn it on.

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message: yes, R5014 was i had been using whole time :) but it doesnt work with only battery ( sometimes works). Without keyboard

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message:
i retake this board finally. Anyone can help me with that?

Run from charger, charge battery, but not running from battery. The only way to run from battery is to boot it in smc bypass or boot with magsafe connected and disconnect if after booting

title: 820-2879 not turning on.
message:
We need some power sequence signals on battery only.
When doesn't start, of course.
